game.title: Human Expenditure Program
game.storyline: A sequel to BLOODMONEY! where players manage Harvey Harvington's digital consciousness while his wife Eun-Mi secretly monetizes his suffering through a torture simulation.

characters.name: Harvey Harvington
characters.description: The protagonist whose consciousness has been digitized and is now trapped in a virtual environment, unaware of his wife's monetization scheme.
characters.quote: I just want to understand what's happening to me...

characters.name: Eun-Mi
characters.description: Harvey's wife who secretly profits from his digital suffering, creating moral dilemmas about love, loyalty, and exploitation.

characters.name: Toby
characters.description: A mysterious figure who may hold keys to understanding the true nature of Harvey's situation.
characters.quote: The truth is rarely as simple as we want it to be.

playerReviews.author: HorrorFan92
playerReviews.comment: Deeply unsettling and thought-provoking. The moral choices really got to me.

playerReviews.author: VisualNovelLover
playerReviews.comment: Brilliant storytelling and character development. Left me thinking for days.

playerReviews.author: GamerPhilosopher
playerReviews.comment: SHROOMYCHRIST has created something truly unique. The themes hit hard.

schema.name: Human Expenditure Program
schema.description: A psychological horror visual novel exploring themes of responsibility and moral choice
